main_definition: Designers are individuals who create or plan the look, functionality, and structure of objects, systems, environments, or visuals.

meanings_and_examples.example: The team of architects and interior designers created a modern yet comfortable living space for the new family.
Alexa showcased her latest clothing line at Paris Fashion Week, highlighting innovative designs in textiles.
The graphic designer created a captivating logo and brand identity for the new startup company.
The product design team developed a sleek, user-friendly interface for an electronic device that revolutionized its functionality.
